DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy volunteer Adult male females nonchild bear potential 18 55 year age , inclusively Body weight > 60 kg ( 132 lb ) body mass index ( BMI ) 19 33 Exclusion criterion : Any clinically relevant abnormality identify screen history , physical laboratory examination , medical condition circumstance make volunteer unsuitable participation study . Subjects metabolize carvedilol poorly base CYP2D6 genotyping determine screen . Treatment prescription nonprescription drug ( include vitamin , herbal dietary supplement , well grapefruitcontaining product ) within 7 day 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) prior first dose study medication end study . Treatment CYP2D6 inhibitor limit quinidine , fluoxetine , paroxetine , duloxetine , terbinofine least 14 day 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) prior Day 1 Session 1 end study . Treatment investigational drug within 30 day 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) precede Day 1 Session 1 Exposure four new chemical entity within 12 month prior first dose day . History regular alcohol consumption exceed 7 drinks/week woman 14 drinks/week men ( 1 drink = 5 ounce wine 12 ounce beer 1.5 ounce hard liquor ) within 6 month screen . Positive urine drug screen ( UDS ) include alcohol screening . A minimum list drug screen include amphetamine , barbiturate , cocaine , opiates , cannabinoids benzodiazepine . Urine Na/creatinine ratio < 0.08 meq/mg . Positive Hepatitis B surface antigen , HIV . Women childbearing potential . NOTE : Premenopausal female document tubal ligation hysterectomy eligible . Postmenopausal females eligible , define 12 month spontaneous amenorrhea ( questionable case blood sample simultaneous follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) > 40 MlU/ml estradiol < 40 pg/ml ( < 140 pmol/L ) confirmatory ] . Resting heart rate ≤ 50 beat per minute ( bpm ) screening . Any following abnormality 12lead ECG screening : conduction abnormality denote follow : PR interval < 120 msec > 200 msec nonspecific IVCD ( intraventricular conduction delay ) QRS duration ≥ 110 msec morphology NOT meet criterion leave ( LBBB ) right bundle branch block ( RBBB ) incomplete RBBB define QRS duration ≥100 msec < 120 msec RBBB pattern Complete RBBB LBBB evidence second third degree AV block pathological Qwaves ( Qwave wider 0.04 sec depth great 0.40.5 mV ) evidence ventricular preexcitation evidence leave axis deviation ( left axis deviation 30 90 degree ) normal leftward axis , STT wave abnormality , leave bundle branch block and/or right bundle branch block QTcB interval > 450 msec Documented history low blood pressure ( average SBP ≤ 110 mm Hg and/or DBP ≤ 50 mm Hg ) blood pressure value time screen . Orthostatic hypotension diagnose screening ( orthostatic hypotension define reduction systolic blood pressure 20 mmHg and/or reduction diastolic blood pressure 10 mmHg stand vs. supine measurement . Donation blood excess 500 mL within 56day period include estimate 442 mL blood drawn study . History asthma , COPD and/or hypersensitivity βadrenergic block agent . History sensitivity heparin , heparininduced thrombocytopenia , sensitivity study medication component thereof . History anaphylaxis anaphalactoid reaction severe allergic response drug . History angioedema . History sensitivity carvedilol , lisinopril , alphablockers , betablockers ACE inhibitor .
